alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 11:29PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Perry and central Dallas Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1129 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bogue Chitto, or 13 miles southeast of Uniontown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Orrville, Bogue Chitto, Memorial Stadium, Marion Junction, Dallas County Horse Arena, Potter Station, Skyharbor Airport, Radford, Safford, Summerfield, Hazen, Suttle, Edmund Pettus Bridge, Selma University and Barrett Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for south central and central Alabama.
